LanguageData.Blake_UseStoneClone.label: 石分身
LanguageData.Blake_UseStoneClone.description: Load Gravity Dust to turn your next 3 shadow clones into stone clones. Stone clones provide more cover and last longer than normal shadow clones.
LanguageData.Blake_UseIceClone.label: 冰分身
LanguageData.Blake_UseIceClone.description: Load Ice Dust to turn your next 3 shadow clones into ice clones. Ice clones freeze melee attackers and last a little bit longer than normal shadow clones.
LanguageData.Blake_UseFireClone.label: 火分身
LanguageData.Blake_UseFireClone.description: Load Fire Dust to turn your next 3 shadow clones into fire clones. Fire clones explode after a short time.
